name: Vektor_8
description:
Crazy Space Chaos!  Survive as long as you can to achieve your best score possible!

Shoot asteroids with their opposite color to destroy them!

Shoot the enemy space fish with their own color to take them out!

Change colors with W, A, S, D

Fire with Left Mouse

Thrust Forward with Right Mouse!

High Scores will likely be added soon!

***********************************************************************************

If you like the look of my games here on itch.io, be sure and check out my "baby" that was my first published game ever over on  Steam!

Rock 'N Roll is a challenging arcade action asteroid blaster featuring 14 game changing power-ups, ship upgrades, resource collecting and selling, and an intense mission to save the Earth before you die!  

You can check out my massive retro action space shooter game inspired by the classic "Asteroids!" arcade game on Steam called Rock 'N Roll right HERE:

http://store.steampowered.com/app/665930/Rock_N_Roll/

***********************************************************************************
